price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߘߊ߲ߞߊ ߟߋ߫ ߓߌ߬ߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߣߐ߬ߡߊ߬ ߘߎߢߊ߫ ߣߌ߲߬ ߘߐ߫ ، ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߊ߲߬ߜߏ߬ߦߊ߬ߓߊ߰ߕߐ ߟߋ߬ ߝߣߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߟߐ߬ߓߊ ߟߏ߲
arabic: وَأَتۡبَعۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي هَٰذِهِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَةٗۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَقۡبُوحِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-atbaʿnāhum fī hādhihi al-dun'yā laʿnatan wayawma al-qiyāmati hum mina al-maqbūḥīna
translations: And We caused to follow them
